title: Enhancing Practical Teaching Competencies: Evidence-Based Approaches to Sports Drug Use and the Role of Pharmacists

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Analyze cases of sports drug use to explain evidence-based decision-making processes
Interpret international anti-doping regulations, including the WADA Prohibited List, and provide application examples
Design role models for pharmacists as part of the Athlete Support Personnel (ASP) and propose medication management strategies
Facilitate large-scale learner discussions and case studies using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
